name: Steel Panthers III: Brigade Command
summary: Steel Panthers 3 - Brigade Command is the sequel to original Steel Panthers. This game covers the entire war history the 20th century starting with the World War II The major change from the previous games is that Steel Panthers 3 puts the player into the role of Brigade Commander, leader of an entire sector of battle. This new point of view has an advantage of more advanced strategy, however can be boring and too extensive from time to time.
